plotTrackNetDisplacements

public java.util.ArrayList<ij3d.Content> plotTrackNetDisplacements(int timestart,
                                                                   int timeend,
                                                                   java.util.ArrayList<TrajectoryObj> tList,
                                                                   java.util.ArrayList<javax.vecmath.Point3f> ref)
plots net displacement towards a reference point or bar. net displacement is caliculated from full track (compare with "Incremental" methods). if ref arraylist containes only one, then point. if two, a line (reference bar) eventually, this could also be a surface.

Parameters:
timestart -
timeend -
tList -
ref - List of doubles, in case of reference line [r0x, r0y, r0z, r1x, r1y, r1z]
Returns:

calcDisplacementVector

public Plot4d.DispVec calcDisplacementVector(org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D sev,
                                             org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D srv)
Calculates displacement vector towards a reference point. returned value is a DispVec class holding containing displacement vector and direction (1 or -1)

Parameters:
sev - track start to the end point
srv - trackstart point to the reference point
Returns:
DispVec instance, holding a Vector3D, the net displacement vector towards a point and its direction

calcDisplacementVector

public Plot4d.DispVec calcDisplacementVector(org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D sev,
                                             org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D rv,
                                             org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D pv,
                                             org.apache.commons.math.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D qv)
Calculates displacement vector towards a reference bar. returned value is an DispVec class holding containing displacement vector and direction (1 or -1)

Parameters:
sev - track vector, between start and end
rv - reference vector
pv - track start point to reference start point
qv - track start point to reference end point
Returns:
DispVec instance, holding a Vector3D, the net displacement vector towards a point and its direction

followings are calculated in this methods:
pvproj --- length of projection of pv onto rv
refdash --- above projected vector (scaled rv)
dv vector --- starting at track start point, perpendicular to rv. (ends at the tip of refdash)
dvdash --- sev projected onto dv. the displacement vector towards reference

calcDisplacement

public double calcDisplacement(Plot4d.DispVec dispvec)
taking track net displacement vector and net displacement vector, returns displacement scalar values with signs depending on towards/away from the reference.

Parameters:
dispvec - DispVec instance holding displacement vector and direction (1 or -1)
Returns:
displacement length, signed (+ if towards, - if away).
